import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router"; import googleLogo from "../assets/googlemain.png"; // import Axios from "axios"; const Signupform = () => { const [successSubmit, setSuccessSubmit] = useState; const [successMech, setSuccessMech] = useState; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullname: "", email: "", address: "", company: "", password: "", password_confirmation: "", }); const handleUserSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } // Handle successful response const data = await response.json(); console.log("Success:", data); setSuccessSubmit(true); } catch (error) { // console.error("Error:", error.message); } }; const handleMechSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch( "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/mechanic/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), } ); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } // Handle successful response const data = await response.json(); console.log("Success:", data); setSuccessMech(true); } catch (error) { // console.error("Error:", error.message); } }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; return (
{/* Sign up form for Customers Only*/}
{/* Sign up form header*/}

Sign Up as User

{/* Sign up form*/}
{successSubmit ? (

Succesfull Registeration

) : (

Registeration Failed

)}
{/* Content below form*/}

Already have an account? Log In

Or

By Signing up you agree with the company's Terms of Use Privacy Policy

{/* Sign up form for Mechanics Only*/}
{/* Sign up form header*/}

Sign Up as Mechanic

{/* Sign up form*/}
{successMech ? (

Succesfull Registeration

) : (

Registeration Failed

)}

Already have an account? Log In

); }; export default Signupform;
